title: Vox-ATypI classification
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321232629/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Typeface Classification Schemes](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321232629/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typeface%20Classification%20Schemes) : VOX-ATypI classification**

The main categories of the VOX system are:  
 [The Humanists](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321232629/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Humanist)  
 [The Garaldes](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321232629/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Garalde)  
 [The Realists](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321232629/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Realist)  
 [The Didones](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321232629/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Didone)  
 [The Mechanicals](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321232629/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mechanical)  
 [The Lineals](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321232629/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linear)  
 [The Inscriptionals](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321232629/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Inscriptional)  
 [The Scripts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321232629/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Script)  
 [The Hands](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321232629/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Handwriting)  
 [The Black letters](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321232629/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Blackletter)  
 [The Gaelic types](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321232629/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gaelic)  
The Non-Latin Typefaces

[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/VOX-ATypI\_classification](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321232629/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/VOX-ATypI_classification "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/VOX-ATypI\_classification")

author: paul d hunt
